actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide a $350 per month aid and attendance allowance to veterans who have suffered the loss or loss of use of both hands as a result of a service-connected injury.

summary.text: Provides $350 additional monthly aid and attendance allowance to war veterans who have suffered the loss or loss of use of both hands as a result of a service-connected injury.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide a $350 per month aid and attendance allowance to veterans who have suffered the loss or loss of use of both hands as a result of a service-connected injury.
